name: Snake Mango
description:
Almost didn’t MAKE IT!!!

With only 12h available to me this weekend, I had to still try to get something done for LD42.

I present you Snake Mango.

A snake clone with a twist. The more mangos you eat the more Rooms you get. But don’t let that fool you, more rooms are only a temporary relief, you will find that you will keep running out of space very quickly. your unquenchable hunger will keep you hunting for more mangos to get more rooms, in a struggle for all ages.

I eat mangos cause I need more space, and I need more space cause I eat mangos.

  • Grow your snake by eating mangos
  • The more mangos eaten the more rooms will unlock
  • Keep growing until the end
  • S to start
  • R to restart
  • WASD or Arrows keys to move

Good Luck Everyone.
